# Interface: IBip44GeneratorState

Definition of address generator state.

## Properties

### accountIndex

• **accountIndex**: `number`

The account index.

---

### isInternal

• **isInternal**: `boolean`

Is this an internal address.

### addressIndex

• **addressIndex**: `number`

The address index.
